document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

Biology. Forests, meadows, ruderal habitats. Adults occur in IV–X ( Dieckmann 1977 ). On Fabaceae :
Vicia articulata
,
V. hybrida ( Hoffmann 1958 )
;
V. cracca
,
V. hirsuta
,
V. sylvatica
( Hoffmann 1958 ; Smreczyński 1965 ; Dieckmann 1977 ; Nazarenko 2009c );
Medicago lupulina
,
Trifolium pratense
,
V. tenuifolia ( Solodovnikova 1963a )
;
Lathyrus pratensis
,
V. articulata
,
V. villosa
( Dieckmann 1977 ; Nazarenko 2009c );
V. cassubica (Isayev 2007)
;
V. pisiformis ( Dedyukhin 2012 )
.
